original_text: This was the list of the clans of the Kohathites, all who served in the tent of meeting, whom Moses and Aaron listed according to the commandment of the Lord by Moses.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 회막에서 종사하는 고핫인의 모든 종족 중 계수된 자이니라

sentences.original_text: This was the list of the clans of the Kohathites,
all who served in the tent of meeting,
according to the commandment of the Lord by Moses.
